Indenture between William Judson and The Michigan Southern Rail Road Company
Judson, William, active 1854
AHMC - Judson, William
1 item(s) in 1 folder
1854 Lease for a four year term by William Judson to the Michigan Southern Rail Road Company of the south half of the first floor of the building at 195 and 197 Broadway, at the intersection with Dey Street, in New York.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Indenture between William Judson and The Michigan Southern Rail Road Company
